Posts.Content: I have been on Anastrozole for over two and a half years. After breast cancer I started on Tamoxifen and then after a total hysterectomy in Jan. 2012 I went on Anastrozole. I have had no problems with taking it. I do have hot flashes but I have had those since  the time I started chemo over 5 years ago. I know everyone is different but my experience has been that being on Anastrozole is no big deal. Report Hi, Denise, I have just been prescribed anastrozole, and I was glad to find your post on this site.   Could you please tell me if you experienced hair loss, or any other types of side effects? Thanks so much! Report
Posts.Title: I like Arimidex
